backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing admin-protected product CRUD and user profile storage with access control and external blob handling.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, and test references for recent frontend fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their roles in UI, product management, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH color theme and CSS variables defining light/dark mode design tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling view routing, error boundaries, and transitions between marketing, shop, gallery, and product views.
UI component showing login-required or access-denied screens using shadcn/ui cards and alerts.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Top-level error boundary catching render failures and showing a recovery UI with reload and reset actions.
Displays an About section with business description paragraphs and key stats like products, customers, and support hours.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Catego: Renders a grid of product category cards with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Shows contact cards for address, phone, email, and hours plus call-to-action buttons for calling or visiting the store.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Provides a footer with brand info, social links, quick navigation links, and contact details.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Header: Implements a responsive header with logo, navigation links, view switching, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Hero.t: Displays a hero section with background image, headline, description, and call and directions buttons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Shows a grid of service cards highlighting available support and offerings.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Inval: Fallback view showing a not-found message with a button to return to the shop.
frontend/src/components/products/SafePro: Displays an image with fallback placeholder when the source is missing or fails to load.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the userâ€™s identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Determines if the authenticated caller is an admin using the backend actor and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages identity loading, login, and state via Internet Identity using a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting products via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file with no queries because the backend currently has no methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/fileToExternalBlob.ts: Converts a File into an ExternalBlob by reading it into a byte array.
frontend/src/lib/openEndWrenchBulk.ts: Generates ProductInput objects for predefined wrench sizes using a shared image asset.
frontend/src/lib/storeAddress.ts: Exports the store address and a helper to generate its Google Maps URL.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/BuyProduct.tsx: Product purchase page that loads product details, displays images, manages quantity, and provides call/email order actions.
frontend/src/pages/Gallery.tsx: Builds a product-gallery view by flattening product images and showing a preview dialog with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductManagement.tsx: Implements admin-only product CRUD with image uploads, bulk add tools, and guarded access handling.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: Displays a product list with images, descriptions, prices, and a buy action, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/utils/safeProduct.ts: Provides safe accessors for product fields and image URLs, validating blobs and returning fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, layouts, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, feature definitions, known issues, and architectural notes for a hardware shop website project. Indicates a fix request due to a blank-page deployment issue and lists existing functional requirements.
